commit message: Make the dialogs retain their instance
Make RunCommand parcelable
Use the latest version of material dialogs 0.6.1.x

Re-write the app using fragments

By using fragments, I no longer need some ugly hacks for handling rotation.
It also allows for more segmented logic - now the RunDialog handles the process of actually getting logs
Remove old main activity
Clean up imports
Minor cleanup, un-hide the live logcat option
Prevnet the running dialog from closing
Update copyrights for 2015
Update material dialogs
Update build tools and dependencies
Prevent crashes from trying to show dialog after the user left the app
Update deps

Tweak buffer sizes for live logcat

There is still a buffer which causes a delay, but it is much better than
before.
I tried a buffer size of 32, but it takes a few minutes to dump the past
log and reach the real-time part
Clean up strings, change the live logcat title to 'Live Logcat'
Tweak text size and scroll buffers
Use a ProcessBuilder, force GC when finishing live logcat
Update build deps
Fix for compiling against API23

Add option to clear logcat buffer

It will show a warning dialog, but there is an option to hide the dialog if you want
Update gradle files
Color the logcat output and only show the last 100 lines
Don't call System.gc()

Update Material Dialogs, add easy permissions

I had to install material dialgos manually, Jitpack gives me 'peer unauthenticated' errors

Remove -T option from logcat command

This appears to be 6.0+ only
Add runtime permission checks
Add icons for stopping/restarting the live logcat fragment
Add options to stop and restart the logcat
Bump amx lines up to 500 for live logcat
Update the about dialog

Add about live logcat view dialog

It will appear automatically the first time the activity is started
Update copyright year for 2016

Bump version to 1.9.1

Also move version code and name into build.gradle.

This version is intended only for F-Droid
